#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long n,x,i;long long array[100001]; long long s[100001];
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&x);
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&array[i]);
			array[i] = array[i] - x;
		}
		s[1]=array[1];
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(s[i-1]<=0)
			{
				s[i] = array[i];
			}
			else
			{
				s[i] = array[i] + s[i-1];
			}
		}
		long long max= -1000000000;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]>=max)
			{
				max = s[i];
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",max);
	}
	return 0;
}
